cards.name: Ambassador Oak
cards.text: When Ambassador Oak enters the battlefield, put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Treefolk and elves share a common interest in the forests, but really the elves just feel at home with the view from above.

cards.name: Auntie's Snitch
cards.text:
Auntie's Snitch can't block.
Prowl {1}{B} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Goblin or Rogue.)
Whenever a Goblin or Rogue you control deals combat damage to a player, if Auntie's Snitch is in your graveyard, you may return Auntie's Snitch to your hand.

cards.name: Ballyrush Banneret
cards.text: Kithkin spells and Soldier spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
cards.flavor: Only wool from the side of the springjack turned most often to the sun can be woven into kithkin battle standards. Jackherds record every movement of their woolly-jacks until shearing.

cards.name: Battletide Alchemist
cards.text: If a source would deal damage to a player, you may prevent X of that damage, where X is the number of Clerics you control.
cards.flavor: "I do not heal. Healing means that the pain has already been felt. To stop suffering, one must prevent the world's wounds altogether."

cards.name: Bitterblossom
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and put a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: In Lorwyn's brief evenings, the sun pauses at the horizon long enough for a certain species of violet to bloom with the fragrance of mischief.

cards.name: Blightsoil Druid
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: "See the beauty in death: the clean white bones lying in the fertile soil and the brightly colored moonglove sprouting from the fell earth."

cards.name: Boldwyr Heavyweights
cards.text:
Trample
When Boldwyr Heavyweights enters the battlefield, each opponent may search his or her library for a creature card and put it onto the battlefield. Then each player who searched his or her library this way shuffles it.
cards.flavor: Even if giants bring nothing else on a journey, they bring attention.

cards.name: Boldwyr Intimidator
cards.text:
Cowards can't block Warriors.
{R}: Target creature becomes a Coward until end of turn.
{2}{R}: Target creature becomes a Warrior until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Now everyone knows what you are."

cards.name: Borderland Behemoth
cards.text:
Trample
Borderland Behemoth gets +4/+4 for each other Giant you control.
cards.flavor: Giants share nothing but their fury.

cards.name: Bosk Banneret
cards.text: Treefolk spells and Shaman spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
cards.flavor: Deep in a murmuring bosk, where the trees' memories span centuries, the simple banner of green and copper signifies an elder whose rings number more than a faerie's days.

cards.name: Bramblewood Paragon
cards.text:
Each other Warrior creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
cards.flavor: Those who seek to escape her blades succeed only in dying on their stomachs.

cards.name: Brighthearth Banneret
cards.text:
Elemental spells and Warrior spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Reinforce 1—{1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.)
cards.flavor: The banner symbolizes the goodwill of the Brighthearth. Their emissaries bring the mastery of fire to other races.

cards.name: Burrenton Bombardier
cards.text:
Flying
Reinforce 2—{2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.)
cards.flavor: The flasks provide ballast, a means of steering, and—with a little luck—a way to deliver ward-spells to cohorts below.

cards.name: Burrenton Shield-Bearers
cards.text: Whenever Burrenton Shield-Bearers attacks, target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Soul and bones, kithkin are woven into their clans. They fight fiercely and without self-interest.

cards.name: Cenn's Tactician
cards.text:
{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Soldier creature.
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it can block an additional creature.
cards.flavor: The choke point was the plan, but devoted camaraderie was always her strategy.

cards.name: Chameleon Colossus
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
Protection from black
{2}{G}{G}: Chameleon Colossus gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.

cards.name: Changeling Sentinel
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
Vigilance
cards.flavor: There's nothing more unsettling than locking blades with something that looks just like you.

cards.name: Cloak and Dagger
Coordinated Barrage
cards.text: Choose a creature type. Coordinated Barrage deals damage to target attacking or blocking creature equal to the number of permanents you control of the chosen type.

cards.name: Countryside Crusher
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it into your graveyard and repeat this process.
Whenever a land card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, put a +1/+1 counter on Countryside Crusher.

cards.name: Cream of the Crop
cards.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may look at the top X cards of your library, where X is that creature's power. If you do, put one of those cards on top of your library and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Daily Regimen
cards.text:
Enchant creature
{1}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
cards.flavor: What self-indulgence tears down, discipline builds up again.

cards.name: Declaration of Naught
cards.text:
As Declaration of Naught enters the battlefield, name a card.
{U}: Counter target spell with the chosen name.
cards.flavor: Every story, even a faerie tale, comes to an end.

cards.name: Deglamer
cards.text: Choose target artifact or enchantment. Its owner shuffles it into his or her library.
cards.flavor: The more pleasant an illusion's garb, the more indecent its form laid bare.

cards.name: Dewdrop Spy
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Dewdrop Spy enters the battlefield, look at the top card of target player's library.
cards.flavor: Only in dew from Oona herself is there clarity enough to see a victim's mind.

cards.name: Disperse
cards.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: Gryffid scowled at the sky. A perfect day for the hunt tainted by clouds. He wished them gone. High above, the clouds looked down, scowled, and made a wish of their own.

cards.name: Distant Melody
cards.text: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type.
cards.flavor: Oona's song is like a twisted dinner chime. All the faeries return home, but it is Oona who feasts—on the stolen dreams and rumors they serve her.

cards.name: Diviner's Wand
Door of Destinies
cards.text:
As Door of Destinies enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen type, put a charge counter on Door of Destinies.
Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1 for each charge counter on Door of Destinies.

cards.name: Earthbrawn
cards.text:
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Reinforce 1—{1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.)
cards.flavor: Gremil finally felt in touch with nature—and felt a need to share the experience with others.

cards.name: Earwig Squad
cards.text:
Prowl {2}{B} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Goblin or Rogue.)
When Earwig Squad enters the battlefield, if its prowl cost was paid, search target opponent's library for three cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

cards.name: Elvish Warrior
cards.flavor: As graceful as a deer leaping a stream and as deadly as the wolf waiting in ambush on the other side, elvish warriors are the eyes of the forest as well as its unsheathed claws.

cards.name: Everbark Shaman
cards.text: {T}, Exile a Treefolk card from your graveyard: Search your library for up to two Forest cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: "May you rise again, from seed to sapling to sentience."

cards.name: Fencer Clique
cards.text:
Flying
{U}: Put Fencer Clique on top of its owner's library.
cards.flavor:
You may as well try to swat a faerie
—Flamekin expression meaning
"that's impossible"

cards.name: Fendeep Summoner
cards.text: {T}: Up to two target Swamps each become 3/5 Treefolk Warrior creatures in addition to their other types until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "What is drowned is not forgotten. I will fulfill my oath. Come back to me, my brethren, as I have come back for you."

cards.name: Fertilid
cards.text:
Fertilid enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches his or her library for a basic land card and puts it onto the battlefield tapped. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

cards.name: Festercreep
cards.text:
Festercreep enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{1}{B}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Festercreep: All other creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: A single festercreep isn't alone. It's already an infestation.

cards.name: Feudkiller's Verdict
cards.text: You gain 10 life. Then if you have more life than an opponent, put a 5/5 white Giant Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"There are all kinds of strengths, but if you have strength of soul, the others will follow."
—Galanda Feudkiller

cards.name: Final-Sting Faerie
cards.text:
Flying
When Final-Sting Faerie enters the battlefield, destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.
cards.flavor: Many heroes' last sight is a grin at the other end of a rapier.

cards.name: Fire Juggler
cards.text: Whenever Fire Juggler becomes blocked, clash with an opponent. If you win, Fire Juggler deals 4 damage to each creature blocking it. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Floodchaser
cards.text:
Floodchaser enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it.
Floodchaser can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Floodchaser: Target land becomes an Island until end of turn.

cards.name: Forfend
cards.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures this turn.
cards.flavor:
"Suddenly there stood a fortress protecting the clachan, its walls hewn of valor and mortared with honor."
—Clachan Tales

cards.name: Frogtosser Banneret
cards.text:
Haste
Goblin spells and Rogue spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
cards.flavor: The Frogtossers thread feathers, bones, and trophies from past raids into their standards, believing they fuel the warren with the anger of its victims.

cards.name: Game-Trail Changeling
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
Trample
cards.flavor:
"I pity them, never knowing the pleasures of a single familiar form, but at least they find a noble shape at times."
—Desmera, perfect of Wren's Run

cards.name: Gilt-Leaf Archdruid
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a Druid spell, you may draw a card.
Tap seven untapped Druids you control: Gain control of all lands target player controls.
cards.flavor: "In our hands, the natural world finds more beauty than nature alone could ever provide."

cards.name: Graceful Reprieve
cards.text: When target creature dies this turn, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
cards.flavor: "In my moment of death, I had a vision of the world, dark and unwelcoming. I wanted to hide in the deepest meander, but the light pulled me back."

cards.name: Greatbow Doyen
cards.text:
Other Archer creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever an Archer you control deals damage to a creature, that Archer deals that much damage to that creature's controller.
cards.flavor: "My arrows will ever find you."

cards.name: Grimoire Thief
cards.text:
Whenever Grimoire Thief becomes tapped, exile the top three cards of target opponent's library face down.
You may look at cards exiled with Grimoire Thief.
{U}, Sacrifice Grimoire Thief: Turn all cards exiled with Grimoire Thief face up. Counter all spells with those names.

cards.name: Heritage Druid
cards.text: Tap three untapped Elves you control: Add {G}{G}{G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"Study the great spirits of our age and those of the past. Prune secrets from the branching traceries of our lineage."
—Twila, Gilt-Leaf archdruid

cards.name: Hostile Realm
cards.text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature can't block this turn."
cards.flavor: Lorwyn's crust explodes with power when the greater elementals are born. The flamekin use the fallout as cover for forays into enemy territory.

cards.name: Hunting Triad
cards.text:
Put three 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Reinforce 3—{3}{G} ({3}{G}, Discard this card: Put three +1/+1 counters on target creature.)
cards.flavor: "Eyeblights are easy to track. Just follow the imperfections."

cards.name: Idyllic Tutor
cards.text: Search your library for an enchantment card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor:
"If one's life is blessed, solutions to all life's problems will appear at the right moment."
—The Book of Kith and Kin

cards.name: Indomitable Ancients
cards.flavor:
"Odum and Broadbark were the only beings mighty enough to challenge the giant Moran the Destroyer. Their battle lasted a hundred dawns, until Moran became so exhausted that he fell into namesleep. He awoke as Moran the Gardener."
—The Tale of Odum and Broadbark

cards.name: Ink Dissolver
cards.text: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Ink Dissolver, you may reveal it. If you do, each opponent puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

cards.name: Inspired Sprite
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
Whenever you cast a Wizard spell, you may untap Inspired Sprite.
{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

cards.name: Kindled Fury
cards.text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
cards.flavor:
"All beings carry the fire inside them. The challenge is to unleash it before they dwindle into oblivion."
—Illulia, flamekin soulstoke

cards.name: Kinsbaile Borderguard
cards.text:
Kinsbaile Borderguard enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other Kithkin you control.
When Kinsbaile Borderguard dies, put a 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature token onto the battlefield for each counter on it.

cards.name: Kinsbaile Cavalier
cards.text: Knight creatures you control have double strike.
cards.flavor: Ambidexterity is common among kithkin. The thoughtweft links the minds of the left- and right-handed, giving each the knack of the other.

cards.name: Kithkin Zephyrnaut
cards.text: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Kithkin Zephyrnaut, you may reveal it. If you do, Kithkin Zephyrnaut gets +2/+2 and gains flying and vigilance until end of turn.

cards.name: Knowledge Exploitation
cards.text:
Prowl {3}{U} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Rogue.)
Search target opponent's library for an instant or sorcery card. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

cards.name: Latchkey Faerie
cards.text:
Flying
Prowl {2}{U} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Faerie or Rogue.)
When Latchkey Faerie enters the battlefield, if its prowl cost was paid, draw a card.

cards.name: Leaf-Crowned Elder
cards.text: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Leaf-Crowned Elder, you may reveal it. If you do, you may play that card without paying its mana cost.

cards.name: Lightning Crafter
cards.text:
Champion a Goblin or Shaman (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another Goblin or Shaman you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.)
{T}: Lightning Crafter deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Luminescent Rain
cards.text: Choose a creature type. You gain 2 life for each permanent you control of that type.
cards.flavor: Storms in Lorwyn don't patter on village rooftops, but rather drench the clachan in rays of amber light.

cards.name: Lunk Errant
cards.text: Whenever Lunk Errant attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"One's plenty," observed the merrow.
"Way too plenty," agreed the boggart.

cards.name: Lys Alana Bowmaster
cards.text:
Reach (This can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may have Lys Alana Bowmaster deal 2 damage to target creature with flying.

cards.name: Maralen of the Mornsong
cards.text:
Players can't draw cards.
At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player loses 3 life, searches his or her library for a card, puts it into his or her hand, then shuffles his or her library.
cards.flavor: Maralen sent Veesa, Endry, and Iliona—the Vendilion clique—on the gravest of tasks.

cards.name: Meadowboon
cards.text:
When Meadowboon leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature target player controls.
Evoke {3}{W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Merrow Witsniper
cards.text: When Merrow Witsniper enters the battlefield, target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
cards.flavor: "The world above the waterline must be monitored—and, when necessary, adjusted."

cards.name: Mind Shatter
cards.text: Target player discards X cards at random.
cards.flavor: Dark thoughts hatch and twist within the mind, straining to take wing.

cards.name: Mind Spring
cards.text: Draw X cards.
cards.flavor: Fragments of thought refract and multiply, surging in a geyser of dizzying insight.

cards.name: Moonglove Changeling
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
{B}: Moonglove Changeling gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy that creature.)

cards.name: Morsel Theft
cards.text:
Prowl {1}{B} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Rogue.)
Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life. If Morsel Theft's prowl cost was paid, draw a card.

cards.name: Mosquito Guard
cards.text:
First strike
Reinforce 1—{1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.)
cards.flavor: His aim is as sure as a mosquito's sting, but with none of the warning.

cards.name: Mothdust Changeling
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
Tap an untapped creature you control: Mothdust Changeling gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Ever seen a changeling fly into a lantern?"
—Calydd, kithkin farmer

cards.name: Mudbutton Clanger
cards.text: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Mudbutton Clanger, you may reveal it. If you do, Mudbutton Clanger gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Murmuring Bosk
cards.text:
({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)
As Murmuring Bosk enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Treefolk card from your hand. If you don't, Murmuring Bosk enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Murmuring Bosk deals 1 damage to you.

cards.name: Mutavault
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}: Mutavault becomes a 2/2 creature with all creature types until end of turn. It's still a land.
cards.flavor: Some changelings born at Velis Vel never return, but their essence never leaves.

cards.name: Negate
cards.text: Counter target noncreature spell.
cards.flavor: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.

cards.name: Nevermaker
cards.text:
Flying
When Nevermaker leaves the battlefield, put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.
Evoke {3}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Nightshade Schemers
cards.text:
Flying
Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Nightshade Schemers, you may reveal it. If you do, each opponent loses 2 life.

cards.name: Noggin Whack
cards.text:
Prowl {1}{B} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Rogue.)
Target player reveals three cards from his or her hand. You choose two of them. That player discards those cards.

cards.name: Notorious Throng
cards.text:
Prowl {5}{U} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Rogue.)
Put X 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield, where X is the damage dealt to your opponents this turn. If Notorious Throng's prowl cost was paid, take an extra turn after this one.

cards.name: Obsidian Battle-Axe
cards.flavor: It's the flint that sparks a warrior's rage.

cards.name: Offalsnout
cards.text:
Flash
When Offalsnout leaves the battlefield, exile target card from a graveyard.
Evoke {B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Oona's Blackguard
cards.text:
Flying
Each other Rogue creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

cards.name: Orchard Warden
cards.text: Whenever another Treefolk creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
cards.flavor: "After the Rising, a treefolk's mind is as limber and green as its limbs, and is at its most receptive to our teachings."

cards.name: Order of the Golden Cricket
cards.text: Whenever Order of the Golden Cricket attacks, you may pay {W}. If you do, it gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Should you take it in mind to ride a springjack, remember: there are easier ways to fly, and harder ways to break your skull."
—Lann of Cloverdell

cards.name: Pack's Disdain
cards.text: Choose a creature type. Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each permanent of the chosen type you control.
cards.flavor: Like the sun to a flower, the adoring gaze of the tribe is sustenance to an elf. To be shunned is to wither.

cards.name: Preeminent Captain
cards.text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Whenever Preeminent Captain attacks, you may put a Soldier creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.
cards.flavor: "If you need an example to lead others to the front lines, consider the precedent set."

cards.name: Prickly Boggart
cards.text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
cards.flavor:
"Even without the spines, who would dare to touch it?"
—Desmera, perfect of Wren's Run

cards.name: Primal Beyond
cards.text:
As Primal Beyond enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Elemental card from your hand. If you don't, Primal Beyond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast an Elemental spell or activate an ability of an Elemental.

cards.name: Pulling Teeth
cards.text: Clash with an opponent. If you win, target player discards two cards. Otherwise, that player discards a card. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Pyroclast Consul
cards.text: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Pyroclast Consul, you may reveal it. If you do, Pyroclast Consul deals 2 damage to each creature.

cards.name: Rage Forger
cards.text:
When Rage Forger enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other Shaman creature you control.
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks, you may have that creature deal 1 damage to target player.

cards.name: Reach of Branches
cards.text:
Put a 2/5 green Treefolk Shaman creature token onto the battlefield.
Whenever a Forest enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Reach of Branches from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: Growth has no limits.

cards.name: Recross the Paths
cards.text: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Recross the Paths to its owner's hand. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Redeem the Lost
cards.text: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Redeem the Lost to its owner's hand. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Reins of the Vinesteed
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
When enchanted creature dies, you may return Reins of the Vinesteed from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to a creature that shares a creature type with that creature.

cards.name: Release the Ants
cards.text: Release the Ants deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Release the Ants to its owner's hand. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Research the Deep
cards.text: Draw a card. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Research the Deep to its owner's hand. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Reveillark
cards.text:
Flying
When Reveillark leaves the battlefield, return up to two target creature cards with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Evoke {5}{W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Revive the Fallen
cards.text: Return target creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Revive the Fallen to its owner's hand. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Rhys the Exiled
cards.text:
Whenever Rhys the Exiled attacks, you gain 1 life for each Elf you control.
{B}, Sacrifice an Elf: Regenerate Rhys the Exiled.
cards.flavor: Once a famed hunter and packmaster, now a renegade seeking his own path.

cards.name: Rivals' Duel
cards.text: Choose two target creatures that share no creature types. Those creatures fight each other. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
cards.flavor: They could agree on one thing only: one of them must die.

cards.name: Roar of the Crowd
cards.text: Choose a creature type. Roar of the Crowd deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of permanents you control of the chosen type.
cards.flavor: One voice is but a pebble to the rest of the world. A thousand voices at once is an avalanche.

cards.name: Rustic Clachan
cards.text:
As Rustic Clachan enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Kithkin card from your hand. If you don't, Rustic Clachan enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
Reinforce 1—{1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.)

cards.name: Sage of Fables
cards.text:
Each other Wizard creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Draw a card.
cards.flavor: "There is no secret that cannot be sold."

cards.name: Sage's Dousing
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. If you control a Wizard, draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Curse these merrows and their meddling! Since coming near the river, I can't so much as sneeze without being soaked."
—Ashling the Pilgrim

cards.name: Scapeshift
cards.text: Sacrifice any number of lands. Search your library for up to that many land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor:
"Changes far greater than the turning of the leaves await us at season's end."
—Colfenor, the Last Yew

cards.name: Scarblade Elite
cards.text: {T}, Exile an Assassin card from your graveyard: Destroy target creature.
cards.flavor: "Rejoice, eyeblight. In your last hours above the earth, those who bury you will finally make you beautiful."

cards.name: Seething Pathblazer
cards.text: Sacrifice an Elemental: Seething Pathblazer gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Flamekin death rites are elaborate and spectacular affairs. Their greatest fear is death in obscurity."
—Tollek Worldwatcher, journal

cards.name: Sensation Gorger
cards.text: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Sensation Gorger, you may reveal it. If you do, each player discards his or her hand, then draws four cards.
cards.flavor: More, more, more!

cards.name: Shard Volley
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Shard Volley, sacrifice a land.
Shard Volley deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: "Let the mountain's teeth pierce our oppressors."

cards.name: Shared Animosity
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking creature that shares a creature type with it.
cards.flavor:
"It is the nature of souls that they burn more brightly together than apart."
—Vessifrus, flamekin demagogue

cards.name: Shinewend
cards.text:
Flying
Shinewend enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{1}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Shinewend: Destroy target enchantment.

cards.name: Sigil Tracer
cards.text: {1}{U}, Tap two untapped Wizards you control: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
cards.flavor: "The reflection is true. It is you who are distorted and false."

cards.name: Slithermuse
cards.text:
When Slithermuse leaves the battlefield, choose an opponent. If that player has more cards in hand than you, draw cards equal to the difference.
Evoke {3}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Spitebellows
cards.text:
When Spitebellows leaves the battlefield, it deals 6 damage to target creature.
Evoke {1}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)
cards.flavor: Disaster stalks with gaping jaws across unready lands.

cards.name: Squeaking Pie Grubfellows
cards.text: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Squeaking Pie Grubfellows, you may reveal it. If you do, each opponent discards a card.

cards.name: Stenchskipper
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of the end step, if you control no Goblins, sacrifice Stenchskipper.
cards.flavor:
"Many believe it to be the manifestation of all that is vile about the boggarts. I believe it should be avoided—from upwind, if possible."
—Cenn Deagan

cards.name: Stingmoggie
cards.text:
Stingmoggie enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{3}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Stingmoggie: Destroy target artifact or land.
cards.flavor: A path vexed by the stingmoggie was probably the wrong path anyhow.

cards.name: Stinkdrinker Bandit
cards.text:
Prowl {1}{B} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Goblin or Rogue.)
Whenever a Rogue you control attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Stomping Slabs
cards.text: Reveal the top seven cards of your library, then put those cards on the bottom of your library in any order. If a card named Stomping Slabs was revealed this way, Stomping Slabs deals 7 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Stonehewer Giant
cards.text:
Vigilance
{1}{W}, {T}: Search your library for an Equipment card and put it onto the battlefield. Attach it to a creature you control. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: "No matter how strong, an unarmed fighter is no more than a fool."

cards.name: Stonybrook Banneret
cards.text:
Islandwalk
Merfolk spells and Wizard spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
cards.flavor: Made from trout scales and crawfish whiskers, merrows' shimmering banners flash in the water like lightning.

cards.name: Stonybrook Schoolmaster
cards.text: Whenever Stonybrook Schoolmaster becomes tapped, you may put a 1/1 blue Merfolk Wizard creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Merrow schools rarely form by design. They come together naturally as eager learners surround the wisest teachers.

cards.name: Stream of Unconsciousness
cards.text: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn. If you control a Wizard, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Dreams are tempting because one is so powerful in them. Dreams are dangerous because that power is a lie.

cards.name: Sunflare Shaman
cards.text: {1}{R}, {T}: Sunflare Shaman deals X damage to target creature or player and X damage to itself, where X is the number of Elemental cards in your graveyard.
cards.flavor: A spark to light the guttered heart.

cards.name: Supreme Exemplar
cards.text:
Flying
Champion an Elemental (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another Elemental you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.)

cards.name: Swell of Courage
cards.text:
Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
Reinforce X—{X}{W}{W} ({X}{W}{W}, Discard this card: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature.)
cards.flavor:
"Tideshaping is more than creating a few
new puddles."

cards.name: Taurean Mauler
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Taurean Mauler.
cards.flavor: The power of a waterfall. The fury of an avalanche. The intellect of a gale-force wind.

cards.name: Thieves' Fortune
cards.text:
Prowl {U} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Rogue.)
Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Thornbite Staff
Titan's Revenge
cards.text: Titan's Revenge deals X damage to target creature or player. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Titan's Revenge to its owner's hand. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost.)

cards.name: Unstoppable Ash
cards.text:
Trample
Champion a Treefolk or Warrior (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another Treefolk or Warrior you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.)
Whenever a creature you control becomes blocked, it gets +0/+5 until end of turn.

cards.name: Vendilion Clique
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Vendilion Clique enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of his or her library, then draws a card.

cards.name: Vengeful Firebrand
cards.text:
Vengeful Firebrand has haste as long as a Warrior card is in your graveyard.
{R}: Vengeful Firebrand gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The flame of a warrior is never extinguished.

cards.name: Veteran's Armaments
Violet Pall
cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. Put a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: A faerie is the offspring of Oona and mischief.

cards.name: Walker of the Grove
cards.text:
When Walker of the Grove leaves the battlefield, put a 4/4 green Elemental creature token onto the battlefield.
Evoke {4}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Wandering Graybeard
cards.text: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Wandering Graybeard, you may reveal it. If you do, you gain 4 life.
cards.flavor: His tales are as tall as he is, and only a giant's life is long enough to listen to them all.

cards.name: War-Spike Changeling
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
{R}: War-Spike Changeling gains first strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Aren't there boggarts enough in Lorwyn? Couldn't it turn into a sheep? Or a sunflower?"
—Olly of Goldmeadow

cards.name: Warren Weirding
cards.text: Target player sacrifices a creature. If a Goblin is sacrificed this way, that player puts two 1/1 black Goblin Rogue creature tokens onto the battlefield, and those tokens gain haste until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"And that's when it was discovered that boggarts have just half a brain."
—The Book of Other Folk

cards.name: Waterspout Weavers
cards.text: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Waterspout Weavers, you may reveal it. If you do, each creature you control gains flying until end of turn.

cards.name: Weed-Pruner Poplar
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target creature other than Weed-Pruner Poplar gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"When Byoog reached down to pull up a bit of root for the stew, he didn't expect the root to pull back."
—A tale of Auntie Wort

cards.name: Weight of Conscience
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack.
Tap two untapped creatures you control that share a creature type: Exile enchanted creature.
cards.flavor: Sometimes the weight of the world on your shoulders is a literal one.

cards.name: Weirding Shaman
cards.text: {3}{B}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Put two 1/1 black Goblin Rogue creature tokens onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: All boggarts have an auntie, but they don't all have a mum.

cards.name: Winnower Patrol
cards.text: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Winnower Patrol, you may reveal it. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Winnower Patrol.

cards.name: Wolf-Skull Shaman
cards.text: Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Wolf-Skull Shaman, you may reveal it. If you do, put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: A chorus of howls answers his call.
